font-size:14; font-family:微软雅黑; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#000000

item.answer:
【考法 1】 n. 背教者，叛徒： one who rejects a religion, cause, allegiance, or group for another; a deserter
【例】 A band of renegades who had deserted their infantry units were making their way to Mexico. 一支背叛了他们所属的步兵编队的士兵朝着墨西哥前进。
【近】 apostate, betrayer, defector, deserter, recreant, traitor, turncoat
【反】 adherent, loyalist, partisan 忠诚者

【记】 源自re反 + negate + god 否定神，就是背教，背弃信仰，指对信仰，事业，传统背弃
